name: WWE 2K17
description: Now on PC! Welcome to Suplex City, courtesy of cover Superstar Brock Lesnar! WWE 2K17 returns as the reigning, defending, champion of fighting video games!

recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit: Windows速 7, Windows速 8 (8.1) or Windows速 10 (latest updates) Processor: Intel Core i7 3770 / AMD FX-8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 50 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
